item.title: Stefanie add a quote by Fyodor Dostoevsky
item.description: "Above all, don't lie to yourself. The man who lies to himself and listens to his own lie comes to a point that he cannot distinguish the truth within him, or around him, and so loses all respect for himself and for others. And having no respect he ceases to love." -- Fyodor Dostoevsky

item.title: Stefanie add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "So, in the interests of survival, they trained themselves to be agreeing machines instead of thinking machines. All their minds had to do was to discover what other people were thinking, and then they thought that, too." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Stefanie add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "The only difference between Hitler and Bush is that Hitler was elected." -- Kurt Vonnegut
